11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ziyad bin Ilaqah said:"I heard my paternal uncle say: 'I prayed Subh with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and in one of the rak'ahs he recited: "And tall date palms, with ranged clusters

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الصُّبْحِ بِـ { ق }
